tool.name: Filter sequences by ID

param.name: input_fasta
param.label: Fasta file to filter on the identifiers

param.name: columns
param.label: Column(s) containing FASTA identifiers
param.help: Multi-select list - hold the appropriate key while clicking to select multiple columns

tool.help:
**What it does**
Divides a FASTA file in two, those sequences with or without an ID present in the tabular file column(s) specified.
Note that the order of sequences in the original FASTA file is preserved. Also, if any sequences share an identifier, they are all kept -- duplicates are not removed.
